article.subject: How do I get started with the app
article.text: Login and join an existing event or create a new event.

article.subject: What is Avi sail race?
article.text: Avi sail race is an application designed to assist a race officer with task of setting a proper race course.

article.subject: How do I start a new event?
article.text: In the first screen, after logging in, press the plus sign, select a unique event name and set the dates. Pay attention, the user that created the event is the sole event manager (Race Officer).

article.subject: What is an event manager (Race officer)?
article.text: An event manager is the user who created the event. He is the only user who can add/edit the race course, add buoys, assign boats to buoys and delete the event. The event manager is shown on the map with a small flag.

article.subject: What are the capabilities of the other users joining the event?
article.text: Those users have the following capabilities: Joining and leaving events, viewing the other boats, race course and marks, view the bearing and distance of other boats and matks.

article.subject: What is the meaning of the different map icons?
article.text: *flag* Race officer, *Yellow Boat* Own boat, *Green boat* Other boats, *Red Boat* Boat whose location is not updated.

article.subject: How to design a new race course?
article.text: In the map screen select the *race course* icon and select the course type, wind direction, and course length (according to wind speed and boat type or length of first leg).
